languages.text: "Да? Жаль, жаль..." {n}Хейнрикс задумчиво хмыкает, изучая положение на доске.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Да? Жаль, жаль..." {n}Хейнрикс задумчиво хмыкает, изучая положение на доске.{/n}

languages.text: "Really? That's a pity..." {n}Heinrix makes a pensive "hmm" sound as he studies the positions on the board.{/n}

languages.text: “真的吗？那真是太遗憾了……”{n}海因里希一边研究着棋局，一边发出了沉思的“嗯嗯”声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Really? That's a pity..." {n}Heinrix makes a pensive "hmm" sound as he studies the positions on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “真的吗？那真是太遗憾了……”{n}海因里希一边研究着棋局，一边发出了沉思的“嗯嗯”声。{/n}

languages.text: «¿De verdad? Lástima...». {n}Heinrix suelta un «mmm» pensativo mientras estudia las posiciones del tablero.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Really? That's a pity..." {n}Heinrix makes a pensive "hmm" sound as he studies the positions on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad? Lástima...». {n}Heinrix suelta un «mmm» pensativo mientras estudia las posiciones del tablero.{/n}

languages.text: 「本当か？それは残念だ…」{n}ハインリックスは、盤面を眺めながら、「うむむ…」と、うなる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Really? That's a pity..." {n}Heinrix makes a pensive "hmm" sound as he studies the positions on the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「本当か？それは残念だ…」{n}ハインリックスは、盤面を眺めながら、「うむむ…」と、うなる。{/n}

languages.text: « Vraiment ? C'est fort dommage... » {n}Heinrix laisse échapper un « hmm » pensif tout en étudiant la position des pièces sur le plateau.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Really? That's a pity..." {n}Heinrix makes a pensive "hmm" sound as he studies the positions on the board.{/n}

languages.text: "Wirklich? Wie schade ..." {n}Heinrix brummt nachdenklich "hmm" vor sich hin, während er die Positionen auf dem Brett einschätzt.{/n}

languages.text: "Gerçekten mi? Çok yazık..." {n}Heinrix, oyun tahtasındaki konumları incelerken dalgın bir mırıltı çıkarıyor.{/n}
